short_summary: The bid should be in French or English.  The priority  factor of this project The bid of the winner will have the priority on the preference of results.  Work will begin on June 1, 2023.  The duration of the contract is of 2 years after the acquired contract.  There is no certainty that an opportunity of post-argent will be offered.
description: The winner of this bid will work to provide pick up and disposal of  garbage at Bruce Peninsula National Park.  Over the course of the contract, we will make sure to highlight our results for others to see.

full_summary:
### Waste and Recycling Removal - Bruce Peninsula National Park

#### Number of Tendered and Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: 5P300-22-0176/B
* Tender Number: 5P300-22-0176/B
* Tender Reference Date: April 24, 2023
* Tender Open Date: April 24, 2023
* Tender Close Date: May 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM (AST)
* Tender Closing Date at which Bids Must be Received: May 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM (AST)

#### Tender and Contract Details

* Award Notice Date: Not applicable (please refer to the ‘Tender Cancellation and/or Addendum’ section below)
* Contract Description: Waste and recycling removal services at multiple locations within the Bruce Peninsula National Park.
* Contract Term: June 1, 2023, to May 31, 2024 (with option to add up to two additional years)
* Contract Period: 2 years

#### Procurement Method

* Method of Modification: Competitive Open Bidding

#### Information About Submissions

* Submissions Acceptable: Submissions received by either facsimile, or e-mail through the CanadaTenders Public Tenders and Opportunities System will be accepted as official.
* Facsimile Number: (877) 558-2349
* Email Address: [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca)
* File Size: Maximum file size of 15 MB
* Multiple Submissions: Bidder responsible for any failure due to transmission or receipt of the emailed bid exceeding file size restrictions.

#### Noticeability

* Notice URL: 
* Selection Criteria: Lowest price.

#### Region of Delivery
* Bruce Peninsula National Park is the main location. Main location by road accessible within Park.

#### Conflict of Interest

* Conflict of interest guidelines apply.
#### Tenders Cancellation and or Addendum: see document. 
#### Attachments
* Solicitation Document: [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4993/rfq---5p300-22-0176---en.pdf), 
[French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4993/rfq---5p300-22-0176---fr.pdf),
